item.title: Ludlow Massacre - Wikipedia
item.description: #internetContent #history #quickFacts Article link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ludlow_Massacre The Ludlow Massacre was a mass killing perpetrated by anti-striker militia during the Colorado Coalfield War.
